<title level="1" right="Rules">[Naming the Staff](/Rules.aspx?ID=1506)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 167 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
When your staff is complete, give it a name—though skeptics might sneer, spellcasters believe that naming a staff upon creation will help it attune to its new master.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
